dating.post: Just a voice of reason, pointing out that Rich’s characterization of one “friendly and rational” person out of “60 opponents” blithely, but typically, ignores the fact that a broad community of rational scholars and enthusiasts has been asking “Jabba” to provide _evidence_ against the Carbon-14 dating in a thread spanning 89 pages and 3500 posts.  To date, the strongest “evidence” Rich has presented is that he “disagrees” with the experts (with no evidence).  The posters asking, repeatedly, for Rich to present his arguments, rather than, for instance, proposing odd limitations on the discussion, or stooping to unsupported libel against professional with whose conclusions he disagrees, have been more than patient, for JREF.  Rich’s problems have been of his own manufacture–he could easily defuse the entire situation my merely answering the questions put to him, straightforwardly and honestly, with no dodges about “not remembering” what has been said in previous posts.
dating.title: Savage Treatment in Randi Land
